conbody.p: (1)(i) If the offeror selects “does not” in response to the provision at DFARS 204.2104 has been granted.

(b) Reporting. If a contractor reports information to https://dibnet.dod.mil in accordance with the clause at FAR 52.204-25or DFARS 252.204-7018 , the Defense Cyber Crime Center will notify the contracting officer, who will consult with the requiring activity on how to proceed with the contract.
